ModMetaData.name: MedicalDrugs
ModMetaData.author: Brassqund
ModMetaData.description: Adds drugs mostly for medical use: - Adrenaline is a drug that increase the fight-or-flight response, useful to be able to move even with heavy wounds or during desesperate situations. Its effects are short and an overdose can cause death. Can also produce a dependency if used too often - Morphine is a drug used to reduce extreme pain. Extremely powerful, it also make an user unable to do complex actions and abusing of it can cause heavy dependence or an overdose - And even more!
